article.title: GTA 6 becomes second most popular game trailer on YouTube
article.summary: The GTA 6 trailer broke a couple of records after it dropped. For example, it became the most-viewed non-music YouTube video in the initial 24-hour period, with over 90 million views. The first trailer of Grand Theft Auto 6 has now taken over as the platform's second most popular game trailer, surpassing the official Minecraft trailer...
